name: Indiana Jerry: Catacombs of Dread
description:
Indiana Jerry discovered some wicked cool catacombs, but they keep getting turned around. They think you, a giant floating head in the sky, will have the perfect perspective to help navigate the underground maze.

Submission for the Wild Godot Jam #45

  • Underground: Explore underground catacombs

KNOWN BUGS 🐛

This game was made fast, and in ThReE DiMeNsIoNs. That's a whole other dimension of bug to worry about:

  • Z-Fighting (Y-Fighting in Godot): Some terrain flickers due to overlapping meshes. This is a cosmetic-only bug
  • Glitchy scene transitions: sounds, camera, and player glitch uglily on some scene transitions. I believe this is also just cosmetic.

CREDITS 👾

3D models + Materials + Code: this Kookie 🍪

Dialogic: Emi (coppolaemilio) https://github.com/coppolaemilio/dialogic
